Texts.Chs: 把^green;木质筛粉机^reset;带到位于^orange;科技前哨站^reset;的我这里。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Sifter^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

If you have stacks of loose grit like ^orange;silt^reset;, ^orange;Gravel^reset; or ^green;other powdery materials^reset; then just toss them in a ^orange;Sifter^reset; and you can pull resources right out of them! Build a ^orange;Sifter^reset; when you can do so.

Texts.Chs: 筛粉机是非常低效和缓慢的，所以我建议尽快在电子设备制造中心将其升级为^orange;高级筛粉机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Sifters are terribly inefficient and slow, so as soon as you can I advice upgrading to a ^orange;Powder Sifter^reset; at an Electronics Center.
